member.name: T:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex
member.summary: This is class implements a component that extends the System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView control. It adds new properties and also provides "Compatibility" support for some Grid controls commonly used in VB6: MSFlexGrid and APEX TrueDBGrid

This is class implements a component that extends the System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView control. It adds new properties and also provides "Compatibility" support for some Grid controls commonly used in VB6: MSFlexGrid and APEX TrueDBGrid
This partial class add functionality for compatibility with MSFlexGrid

member.summary: Implements the ISupportInitialize.EndInit method. It sets the grid behavior according the Compatibility mode and delegates EndInit logic to the behaviour.

member.name: P:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex.CellAlignment
member.summary: Returns/sets the alignment of data in a cell or range of selected cells. Not available at design time Provides compatibility with the MSFlexGrid CellAligment behaviour. DataGridViewContentAligment contants are used, but the property behaviour resembles the equivalent in MSFlexGrid

member.name: P:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex.CellPictureAlignment
member.summary: Thsi property is used to change the alignment of picture in a cell

member.name: P:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex.ColSel
member.summary: Returns or sets the start or end column for a range of cells You can use these properties (ColSel/RowSel) to select a specific region of the grid programmatically, or to read the dimensions of an area that the user selects into code. The grid cursor is in the cell at Row, Col. The grid selection is the region between rows Row and RowSel and columns Col and ColSel. Note that RowSel may be above or below Row, and ColSel may be to the left or to the right of Col.

member.name: P:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex.RowSel
member.summary: Returns or sets the start or end column for a range of cells You can use these properties (ColSel/RowSel) to select a specific region of the grid programmatically, or to read the dimensions of an area that the user selects into code. The grid cursor is in the cell at Row, Col. The grid selection is the region between rows Row and RowSel and columns Col and ColSel. Note that RowSel may be above or below Row, and ColSel may be to the left or to the right of Col.

member.name: P:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex.Clip
member.summary: Returns/sets the contents of the cells in a FlexGrid's selected region. Not available at design time.

member.summary: Returns or sets the bold style for the current cell text. Provides compatibility for MSFlexGrid

member.summary: Returns or sets the bold style for the current cell text. Provides compatibility for MSFlexGrid

member.name: P:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex.GeneralCurrentCell
member.summary: MSFlexGrid has a different selection behaviour than DataGridView. In a MSFlexGrid the cell that currently has the focus does not have the same background color or "FocusRect" than the other selected cells. To provide an MSFlexGrid compatible behaviour we must provide a way to track that cell

member.name: T:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings
member.summary: This structure stores settings for resizing grids.

member.name: F:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.Rows
member.summary: Indicates if rows should be allowed to be resized.

member.name: F:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.Columns
member.summary: Indicates if columns should be allowed to be resized.

member.name: M:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.ResizeNone
member.summary: Does not allow either rows nor columns to be resized.
member.returns: The GridResizeSettings that do not allow the user to do any resizing.

member.name: M:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.ResizeBoth
member.summary: Allows both rows and columns to be resized.
member.returns: The GridResizeSettings that allow the user to resize both rows and columns.

member.name: M:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.ResizeColumns
member.summary: Allows columns to be resized, but not rows.
member.returns: The GridResizeSettings that allow the user to resize columns, but not rows

member.name: M:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.ResizeRows
member.summary: Allows rows to be resized, but not columns.
member.returns: The GridResizeSettings that allow the user to resize rows, but not columns

member.name: M:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.Apply(UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex)
member.summary: Apply the grid resize settings to the specified grid.
member.param: The grid to which the settings should be applied.

member.name: M:UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.GridResizeSettings.GetCurrent(UpgradeHelpers.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewFlex)
member.summary: Obtains the GridResizeSettings of a specified grid.
member.param: The grid from which to obtain the GridResizeSettings.
member.returns: The GridResizeSettings of the specified grid.
